TopicTitle: Which KSP command line switches to workaround Unity crashes?

Articles.Content:
I'm getting "random" Unity crashes during play. I'd like to diagnose the problem but will settle for just making it stop. My KSP defaults to DX 11 and has the "random" crash problem. I already tested "-force-d3d12" and got a worse problem of crashing as soon as I load a save. I uninstalled a lot of mods and still have the problem (while another heavily modded install is stable).

My next steps are to try -force-opengl and -force-glcore. I'm not even sure those old switches are still valid in KSP 1.12.3.

Are there any other switches you recommend trying?
